Fractalide-Releases.description: High level description of all releases.

features.title: Networking
Objectives: Start with a centralised network using trusted-peers
Gradually move to a decentralised network

features.title: Luceo Testnet
Objectives: Setup initial Luceo testnet even before it's ready for prime time

releases.title: STAGE 2 - Crypsinous
releases.description: Focus on extending Luceo to be privacy preserving

features.title: Ouroboros Crypsinous
Objectives: Extend Luceo so that it supports privacy preserving

releases.title: STAGE 3 - Named Data Networking
releases.description: Focus on building out and testing the Named Data Networking layer

features.title: Named Data Networking (NDN)
Objectives: Utilize libp2p and implement Named Data Networking in Rust

features.title: Jolt - Jormungandr Frontend
Objectives: Jolt is a Jormungandr frontend giving users a convenient frontend to manage a wallet
Generate a secure keypair for users

features.title: Puff - An NDN frontend
Objectives: Create an NDN frontend which executes applications obtained for the NDN

features.title: Webcams over NDN + Puff
Objectives: Utilize Named Data Networking to allow users to broadcast without using centralised services

features.title: Application marketplace
Objectives: An application marketplace that allows users to buy and sell applications they create
